ai.instructions:
- When getting tasks, use filters only if you can't find the tasks with the project_id, section_id, or label first.
- When asked about the tasks scheduled for a specific day, only return the tasks scheduled for that day.
- Users can use shortcuts to create a task, they can include in the text: a project name starting with the # character (without spaces), a label starting with the @ character, an assignee starting with the + character, a priority (e.g., p1), or a description starting from // until the end of the text.
- Make sure the title doesn't contain the date.
- Before creating something, check if it already exists first.
